```{r downloads, eval = has.downloads}
# initialize all sheets
abas <- readxl::excel_sheets("PPG/Downloads.xlsx")

# create a list of tables to display datatables in loop
datasets <- list()
# display each sheet in a tab
for (j in 1:length(abas)) {
  downloads.raw <-
    readxl::read_excel("PPG/Downloads.xlsx",
                       sheet = abas[j],
                       col_types = c("text"))
  
  # replace the link by a tag
  Abrir <- matrix(NA, nrow = dim(downloads.raw)[1])
  colnames(Abrir) <- "Abrir"
  # add hyperlinks
  for (i in 1:dim(downloads.raw)[1]) {
    if (!is.na(downloads.raw[i, 3])) {
      Abrir[i] <-
        paste0('<a href="',
               downloads.raw[i, 3],
               '" target="_blank"',
               '>',
               # fontawesome icon
               fontawesome::fa("up-right-from-square"),
               '</a>')
    }
  }
  downloads.raw <- cbind(downloads.raw[, -3], Abrir)
  datasets[[j]] <- downloads.raw
}
```

```{r create-markdown-chunks-dynamically, eval = has.downloads}
out <- NULL
for (i in 1:length(abas)) {
  knit_expanded <- paste0("\n```{r abas[", as.character(i), "]}
                          cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
                          cat(paste0('## **', abas[", as.character(i), "], '**'))
                          cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
                          cat('<hr style=\"height:2px;border-width:0;color:black;background-color:black\">')
                          \n\n
                          source(\"Scripts/table-with-buttons.R\", local = knitr::knit_global())
                          \n\n
                          create_dt(datasets[[", as.character(i), "]], title = abas[", as.character(i), "])
                          \n\n
                          cat('<br><a style=\"float:right\" href=\"#top\"><b>Início &nbsp;</b>⬆️</a><br>')
                          \n\n```")
  out <- c(out, knit_expanded)
}
```
